attributes.action: Ensure televised 2017 election debates are held ‒ with or without Theresa May.
attributes.background: Theresa May has announced there will be no televised debates for the 2017 General Election. This is undemocratic and an attempt to allow a Tory majority to be rushed through without any scrutiny of policies. The electorate has a right to see the key issues debated, with or without the PM.

rejection.details:
A decision about whether to host a debate would be the responsibility of the broadcasters, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/195600
